name: Zorky and Reginald
description:
Reginald the human has discovered a new planet. In an attempt to strike up a friendly conversation with the aliens, Reginald gets arrested and put into prison. It seems as if this is the end for him, unless..

One of the alien guards, Zorky feels sorry for Reginald. Through the use of the item teleporters in the prison cells, that are meant to send over food, Zorky decides to take a life-threatening risk by trying to free Reginald. However, Reginald must also help Zorky get access to the full security halls in order for Zorky to help him escape. Can they do it?

CONTROLS:

Press the WASD keys to walk

Press E to interact with the world around you.

###Not all created assets made it in the game due to some unforseen challenges caused by source control and absences###

TEAM ROLES:

Lars Betting: Audio / Design / Producer

Daniel  Mckinlay: Lead Programmer / Design

David Smith: Programmer / Source Control

Charlotte Wilkinson : Character assets / Social Media Manager / Menu Background Art

Robyn Crawford : Environement Asset Kits / Environment Artwork

Our Teams Mentor from Sharkmob games was teh wonderful character artist Eugenia Peruzzo!
